name: unity-panel-interfaces
description: Panels are blocks of (UI) content that can be transitioned in and out. Panel-interfaces package contains just the core interfaces so that other packages can interact with panels without depending on implementation code.
author: larrykirschner@gmail.com

scripts.install:test: rm -f *.tgz && npm pack && cd test && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -f *.tgz && cd test && npm run clean
